results.title: Prevalence and Prognosis of Atenolol-Responsive Systolic Anterior Motion of the Septal Mitral Valve Leaflet in Young Cats with Severe Dynamic Left Ventricular Outflow Tract Obstruction
results.text_hl: Whether @DISEASE_615508 @DISEASE_OMIM:615508 @@@SAM@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092242 @@@DLVOTO@@@ would remain absent after discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment is unknown, as no recheck echocardiography was performed after @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was stopped.

results.title: Resolution of dynamic left ventricular outflow tract obstruction and reversible left ventricular hypertrophy in 4 cats.
results.text_hl: Those @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ originally presented with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@congestive heart failure@@@ were successfully weaned off diuretic medications. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ was prescribed to all 4 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@, and all remained on oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ through the final recheck.

citations.NLM: Buchanan K, Lynn C, Hallman C, Thomason J. Resolution of dynamic left ventricular outflow tract obstruction and reversible left ventricular hypertrophy in 4 cats. Can Vet J. 2024 Oct;65(10):1028-1033. PMID: 39355694

results.title: Congenital supravalvular aortic stenosis in a kitten.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular concentric hypertrophy@@@ was noted. Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ therapy was initiated.

results.title: Integrative Approaches in the Management of Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy: A Comprehensive Review of Current Therapeutic Modalities.
results.text_hl: Pharmacological therapies play a pivotal role in the management of @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092242 @@@LVOT obstruction@@@, with a range of drug classes exhibiting distinct mechanisms of action.

results.title: Acquired left-to-right shunting through a valve-incompetent foramen ovale in a cat with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and congestive heart failure
results.text_hl: Three years prior to presentation, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was diagnosed with @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@obstructive hypertrophic cardiomyopathy@@@ and started on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. The @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092242 @@@left ventricular outflow tract obstruction@@@ subsequently resolved.

citations.NLM: Winter RL, Jennings RN, Cronin JP, Rhinehart JD, Schober KE. Acquired left-to-right shunting through a valve-incompetent foramen ovale in a cat with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and congestive heart failure JFMS Open Rep. 2020 Jul-Dec;6(2):2055116920959607. PMID: 33062291

results.title: Acute Effects of Ivabradine on Dynamic Obstruction of the Left Ventricular Outflow Tract in Cats with Preclinical Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy
results.text_hl: The most commonly prescribed medications used to reduce dynamic @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092242 @@@LVOT obstruction@@@ in @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ are beta-adrenergic blockers, particularly @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.
